entry.tran: 偏小的;偏少的;不足的;欠缺的
entry.def: You describe something as scanty when there is less of it than you think there should be.

example.ex: So far, what scanty evidence we have points to two suspects.

entry.def: If someone is wearing scanty clothing, he or she is wearing clothes which are sexually revealing.
